title: Forging a Better Operator Quality of Life
summary: A new Mythic add-on for Windows AgentsMythic provides flexibility to agent developers for how they want to describe and execute techniques.

title: Preventing account takeover on centralized cryptocurrency exchanges in 2025
summary: By Kelly Kaoudis and Evan Sultanik This blog post highlights key points from our new white paper Preventing Account Takeovers on Centralized Cryptocurrency Exchanges, which documents ATO-related attack vectors and defenses tailored to CEXes.

title: Why Cybersecurity Needs Probability — Not Predictions
summary: While probabilities may be based on subjective information, when used in an objective framework, they demonstrate an effective way to improve the value of hard decisions.

title: Abandoned AWS Cloud Storage: A Major Cyberattack Vector
summary: New research highlights how bad actors could abuse deleted AWS S3 buckets to create all sorts of mayhem, including a SolarWinds-style supply chain attack.

title: Attackers Target Education Sector, Hijack Microsoft Accounts
summary: A sophisticated cyberattack campaign is targeting organizations that still rely on Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS) for authentication across applications and services.

title: Nigeria Touts Cyber Success, Even as Cybercrime Rises in Africa
summary: Organizations continue to be at high risk from cybercrime in Africa, despite law enforcement takedowns of cybercriminal syndicates in Nigeria and other African nations.
